timeline.message:
Login for zaas-client
> Modified the tests to reduce the code duplication & added a couple of more tests
Fixed the checkStyle & Gradle build issue
Modified the way ConfigProperties object being constructed & changed the way the httpsClient object is getting initialized
Added lombok annotation processor as dependency

Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client

 Conflicts:
	zaas-client/src/test/resources/configFile.properties

Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client

 Conflicts:
	zaas-client/src/main/java/org/zowe/apiml/zaasclient/exception/ZaasClientErrorCodes.java
	zaas-client/src/main/java/org/zowe/apiml/zaasclient/main/MainClass.java
Query api exception handling for invalid/expired token and unit test
Change unit tests for /query to mock
Zaas-Client: Fixed the licencing failure in tests and modified config.properties to use relatve path. Added gradle publish for zaas-client
Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client-mybranch
Login Junit change for valid Username and password
additional unit tests for query and code refactoring
jUnits for login methods added to get 100% coverage & code refactoring

Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/zaas-client' into zaas-client

# Conflicts:
#	zaas-client/src/test/java/org/zowe/apiml/zaasclient/token/TokenServiceImplTest.java
jUnits for login methods added to get 100% coverage
Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client-mybranch
Removing build and packaging section as we dont need it for zaas-client
Compile time error and cosmetic changes
Adding some changes and few more Integration testcases for Login
Junit tests for HttpsClient and code refactoring

Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client

 Conflicts:

Document the public interface.

Adding more detailed step by step instructions.

Private/jb892003/zaas client review (#604)

* Parametrize and simplify tests

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

* Parametrize and simplify tests
Split the service logic into internal services with one responsibility per service and overall facade service publishing the external API. The facade is responsible for sanity check on inputs.

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Co-authored-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>
Updating the documentation based on the refactoring done by Jakub

Syncing up with latest changes

Signed-off-by: ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com <ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com>

Error handling in case of bad APPLID

Signed-off-by: ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com <ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com>

timeline.bodyText:
This block is repeating, shouldn't it be as separate method?
If path is null, how would user know? Does he need to know?
timeline.author: achmelo

replies.bodyText: Thanks for the feedback. We are working on error handling(based on the reviews received from Petr). Sooner you will get latest updates in the branch.
replies.author: ankitachdhr145

timeline.bodyText: Are these endpoints stable? Can't be changed in future?
timeline.author: achmelo

replies.bodyText: These are APIML endpoints. In case any changes are made in APIML endpoints zaas-client should be modified to accommodate those changes.
replies.author: ankitachdhr145

timeline.message:
Changes to refactor HttpsClient based on feedback received by @achmelo

Signed-off-by: ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com <ankita.choudhary@broadcom.com>

Merge branch 'zaas-client' of https://github.com/zowe/api-layer into zaas-client

 Conflicts:
	zaas-client/src/main/java/org/zowe/apiml/zaasclient/exception/ZaasClientErrorCodes.java

Private/jb892003/zaas review (#612)

* Hide non public classes.
* Remove duplicates from HttpsClient
* Hide the configuration exception in one exception
* Reflect changes in the documentation.
* Properly handle the closing of Client
* Throw configuration related exceptions
* Clean Style
* Improve the testing coverage
* Use ZWEAS as the default for errors from ZAAS Client
* Provide the documentation for the possible error codes
* Update the codes in the tests.
* Properly throw Configuration exception in tests

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Provide more details to the potential error messages.

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Keep cause in Exceptions
Log raised exception on border

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Use proper Error Code enum

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>

Log configuration errors raised when creating the instance
Test errors on the external boundary
Organize build.gradle for better readability

Signed-off-by: Jakub Balhar <jakub.balhar@broadcom.com>
